title: Emerald Blossom Jhumka Earrings - Pachala Rangula Jhumkaalu
materials: Cultured Pearl. Features durable Hyderabadi polish for lasting luster.
features: Floral-inspired design with intricately set CZ stones. A single emerald green stone adds a pop of vibrant color, leading to a delicate pearl jhumka. Modern interpretation of the classic jhumka silhouette, perfect for everyday wear and special occasions.
occasions: or daily wear. A beautiful addition to your Muhurtham or Seemantham attire.
description: Combines traditional Jhumka style with modern design elements. The high-quality CZ stones offer brilliant sparkle at an accessible price. The Hyderabadi polish ensures long-lasting shine and durability. Versatile design complements both traditional and contemporary outfits.
